hero.title: PayMatch on Your Device
hero.description: Install PayMatch as a native app on your phone, tablet, or computer. Get instant access to Swiss invoicing with offline capabilities, push notifications, and lightning-fast performance.

features.title: Why Choose Our PWA?
features.description: Experience the power of a native app with the convenience of the web.

offline.title: Works Offline
offline.description: Create invoices and manage your business even without an internet connection. All changes sync automatically when you're back online.

notifications.title: Push Notifications
notifications.description: Get instant alerts for payment receipts, overdue invoices, and important updates directly to your device.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Cached content loads instantly. No more waiting for pages to load - everything is optimized for speed.

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: Your data stays secure with end-to-end encryption and Swiss privacy standards. No data is stored on your device unnecessarily.

benefits.title: Perfect for Swiss Businesses
benefits.description: Designed specifically for Swiss companies who need reliable, compliant invoicing solutions.

invoicing.title: Swiss QR-Bill Invoicing
invoicing.description: Create compliant Swiss QR-bill invoices with automatic tax calculations and professional formatting.

payments.title: Payment Reconciliation
payments.description: Upload CAMT files and automatically match payments to invoices with Swiss banking standards.

analytics.title: Business Analytics
analytics.description: Track your invoicing performance with detailed reports and insights tailored for Swiss businesses.

management.title: Client Management
management.description: Manage your Swiss clients with address validation, tax ID handling, and compliance features.

devices.title: Works on All Your Devices
devices.description: Install PayMatch on any device and access your data seamlessly across all platforms.
devices.mobileDescription: Full-featured mobile app with touch-optimized interface for creating invoices on the go.
devices.tabletDescription: Perfect for presentations and detailed work with larger screen real estate.
devices.desktopDescription: Complete desktop experience with keyboard shortcuts and advanced features.

installation.title: How to Install
installation.description: Get PayMatch on your device in just a few simple steps.

mobile.title: Mobile & Tablet
mobile.step1: Open PayMatch in your mobile browser (Chrome, Safari, or Edge)
mobile.step2: Look for the 'Add to Home Screen' option in your browser menu
mobile.step3: Tap 'Add' and PayMatch will be installed like a native app

desktop.title: Desktop & Laptop
desktop.step1: Open PayMatch in Chrome, Edge, or Safari
desktop.step2: Click the install button in your browser's address bar or menu
desktop.step3: Follow the prompts to install PayMatch as a desktop app

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of Swiss businesses who trust PayMatch for their invoicing needs.
